name: Granulomatous Lymphocytic Interstitial Lung Disease (GLILD)
chief_complaint: I've been feeling short of breath and tired all the time, and I keep getting infections.
prognosis: Variable; depends on severity and response to treatment. Progressive disease may lead to respiratory failure.
description: GLILD is a rare, non-infectious pulmonary complication of common variable immunodeficiency (CVID) characterized by granulomatous inflammation and lymphocytic infiltration of the lung parenchyma. It represents a complex interplay between immune dysregulation and chronic antigenic stimulation.
